#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
typedef unsigned long long int ll;
int main()
{
    ll i,j,t,p,k;
    scanf("%llu",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%llu",&j);
        k=-2+sqrt(j+9);

        if((k+5)*(k-1)==0)
        {
            printf("-1\n");
            continue;
        }

        printf("%llu\n",k);




    }




    return 0;
}
